# Background Repeat

| Class                   | Support     |
| ----------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
bg-repeat
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-no-repeat
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-repeat-x
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-repeat-y
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-repeat-round
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-repeat-space
``` | 🌐 Web only |
